text: Bio-Booster Armor Guyver (Viz Media) or Guyver (Chuang Yi Publishing) (強殖装甲ガイバー, Kyōshoku Sōkō Gaibā?) is a long-running manga series written by Yoshiki Takaya Category:1986 horror movies Category:1991 movies Category:1994 movies Category:2005 anime television series Category:American action movies Category:Anime OVAs Category:Anime series Category:Manga series Category:1985 manga Category:Dystopian movies Category:Japanese movies
title: Bio Booster Armor Guyver
